description: Unique identifier for a saved form or grid preference record associated with a user profile.
Reference to the user profile that owns these form or grid preferences (foreign key).
Identifier of the application form, sub-form, or grid that the stored preferences apply to.
Serialized configuration for layout and columns (position, size, order, visibility). Used to restore the userâ€™s UI layout; format is vendor-specific and likely encoded; confirm with SME.
Server-side timestamp when this preference record was last updated.
Timestamp captured from the user/client context at last update; may differ from server time; confirm with SME.
Comma-separated list of fields included by default when printing the associated grid or form.
Identifier of the application user who originally created this preference record.
Timestamp when this preference record was initially created.
Identifier of the application user who most recently updated this preference record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this preference record.
